remarks: A monoid homomorphism commutes with composition.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2015.)
statement:
mhmlin.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
mhmlin.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` S ) $.
mhmlin.q $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` T ) $.
mhmlin $p |- ( ( F e. ( S MndHom T ) /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( F ` ( X .+ Y ) ) = ( ( F ` X ) .+^ ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
